title: PBE account
body: Hi guys i'm just move from LOL server SEA to NA for 2 month and have already signed up for the PBE account, i heard that the PBE sign up was close and all the people have already sign will get the PBE account, it been a week but i haven't got my PBE yet and i didn't receive any email also :? is there anything wrong ??????{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Are you meaning the [PBE System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) or the [Alpha Client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ), because these are two **entirely separate systems**.

i mean that i haven't got the PBE but i have already signed up for it 2 month ago and last week there is a news about the sign is shut down and all the player have already signed will get the PBE account but i haven't got it yet, my friends they all have it :((((

We didn't shut down PBE signups, so I think you may be meaning the [Alpha Client](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/client/client-features/client-update-alpha-ending-soon), which is on the verge of ending, with the open Beta coming to NA pretty soon.
